Name: Tutorial Section
Description: Complete the tutorial section of the game.

Name: Visit Starting Town
Description: Time to see if there is anything useful here.

Name: Buy Potion
Description: Get a potion from the town shop.

Name: Learn About Cadences
Description: The old man teaches you how to unlock your true potential.

Name: Farm Goblins
Description: They got gold and we need it!

Name: Farm Trents
Description: If I had the chance, I wood!

Name: Unlock Mining
Description: The blacksmith teaches you how to mine.

Name: Gather Moonberries
Description: Collect glowing berries from the forest floor.

Name: Defeat Treant Guardian
Description: A corrupted guardian blocks the path.

Name: Ancient Inscriptions
Description: Decipher the runes on the temple entrance.

Name: Finding the Hearth
Description: Locate the central power source of the ruins.
